meanings.definition: Denoting one or more people or things already mentioned or assumed to be common knowledge.
meanings.sent1: She saw the cat in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The dog thought he was the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky twinkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the lesson clearly.

meanings.definition: Used to point forward to a following qualifying or defining clause or phrase.
meanings.sent1: I will go to the park if the weather is nice.
meanings.sent2: He will only eat vegetables if they are fresh.
meanings.sent3: She will dance at the party if the music is good.
meanings.sent4: The plan will succeed only if everyone works together.
meanings.sent5: The team will win the game if they play strategically.

meanings.definition: Used to make a generalized reference to something.
